presenter.name: Hsiu-Po Wang

presenter.bio: Ethanol ablation of solid pancreatic tumor

slide.title: EUS-guided ablation of P-NETs
slide.titleNormalized: eus-guided ablation of p-nets
slide.text: EUS-guided ablation of P-NETs EUS-guided ethanol injection EUS-guided RFA

slide.title: Reported cases of EUS-EI for P-NET
slide.titleNormalized: reported cases of eus-ei for p-net
slide.text: Reported cases of EUS-EI for P-NET Auther No. Age Sex Tumor Size (mm) Location Ethanol conc. injection amount Rate of CR Complication 2006 Jurgensen 1 78 F 1 insulinoma 13 body 95% 8 ml 1/1 pain, hyperlipasemia 2008 Deprez 1 78 F 1 insulinoma ? head 98% 3.5 ml 1/1 hyperlipasemia, hematoma, DU 2008 Muscatielo 1 F 2 NETs 7, 11 body 40% <2 ml 2/2 small pancreatic necrosis 2011 Vleggaar 1 82 F 1 insulinoma 9.5 body 96% 0.3 ml 1/1 2012 Schnack 1 89 M 1 insulinoma ? ? ? ? 1/1 pancreatitis 2012 Levy 5 34-82 M/F 2/3 5 insulinomas 8-21 head 3 body 1 tail 1 95-99% 0.1-3 ml 5/5 2014 Bor 1 83 F 1 insulinoma ? ? 95% 3 ml 1/1 2014 Qin 4 48-66 F 4 insulinomas 5.4-11.8 head 2 body 2 95% 0.25-0.5 ml 4/4 2015 Park 11 27-76 M/F 5/6 4 insulinoma, 10 NETs 8-19 uncinate 1 head 6 body/tail 7 99% 0.5-3.8 ml 8/13 3 pancreatitis, 1 pancreatic duct stricture (late)

slide.title: Technique
slide.text: Technique Using a linear array EUS 25-, 22- or 19-gauge EUS-FNA needle 99% ethanol Prime ethanol in FNA needle to clear the air EUS-guided with Doppler Injection with increment of 0.2 cc/inj. From distal part to proximal part of the tumor Change the direction of needle by fanning technique

slide.text: Rule of “5” Larger than 5 mm ( less than 1 cm) Distance from main pancreatic duct not less than 5 mm Not more than 5 tumors per treatment DW Seo HP Wang Christopher Khor M Kida 2013

slide.title: Medicine 2016 Jan; 95(4):e2538
slide.titleNormalized: medicine 2016 jan; 95(4):e2538
slide.text: EUS-guided ethanol ablation was performed using linear array EUS (GF-UCT140/240/260; Olympus Optical, Tokyo, Japan) 22- or 19-gauge (EchoTip; Cook) or 20-gauge celiac plexus neurolysis (CPN) needle (EchoTip Ultra Celiac Plexus Neurolysis; Cook) 99% ethanol The needle was gently withdrawn from deep within the tumor. Medicine 2016 Jan; 95(4):e2538

slide.title: Medicine 2016 Jan; 95(4):e2538
slide.titleNormalized: medicine 2016 jan; 95(4):e2538
slide.text: Medicine 2016 Jan; 95(4):e2538

slide.title: EUS-guided alcohol injection for P-NETs (Taiwan)
slide.titleNormalized: eus-guided alcohol injection for p-nets (taiwan)
slide.text: EUS-guided alcohol injection for P-NETs (Taiwan) The patients with P-NETs and post-operative recurrence who are unwilling to undergo the 2nd operation The patients with functional P-NETs who are unwilling to or can not undergo the operation The MEN-1 patients with P-NETs and functional syndrome (combined with biotherapy) The MEN-1 patients with growing residual P-NETs after 1st operation. G1 or G2 and high serum CgA level

slide.title: Conclusions
slide.text: Conclusions EUS-guided ethanol injection for selected patients with P-NETs may be a good option of treatment. G1/G2 Small size Functional, especial insulinoma High CgA level for non-functional p-NETs if not surgery EUS-guided ethanol injection for multiple P-NETs in MEN-1? For the patients with MEN-1 and carcinoid syndrome, STS-LAR added to EUS-guided alcohol injection should be considered.
